Uses of Package
nachos.security

Packages that use nachos.security
nachos.ag Provides classes that can be used to automatically grade Nachos projects. 
nachos.machine Provides classes that implement the Nachos simulated machine. 
nachos.security Provides classes that can be used to protect the host system from malicious Nachos kernels. 
 

Classes in nachos.security used by nachos.ag
Privilege
          A capability that allows privileged access to the Nachos machine.
 

Classes in nachos.security used by nachos.machine
Privilege
          A capability that allows privileged access to the Nachos machine.
 

Classes in nachos.security used by nachos.security
Privilege
          A capability that allows privileged access to the Nachos machine.
Privilege.InterruptPrivilege
          An interface that provides access to some private Interrupt methods.
Privilege.MachinePrivilege
          An interface that provides access to some private Machine methods.
Privilege.ProcessorPrivilege
          An interface that provides access to some private Processor methods.
Privilege.TCBPrivilege
          An interface that provides access to some private TCB methods.
